page.title: 19An Ordinary Day
page.content:
I wake at 7.00 am, get up at 7.30, go downstairs and have{breakfast.}Then I return to wash and dress for school. I wait for my friend and when she comes we set off. The school bell goes at 9.00. I am a{prefect}and have to watch everybody coming in to school. We have morning{assembly}and back in the classroom we{read}and do{maths.
We have{playtime}at 10.30 am, then work again until 12.00 pm. After{lunch we play in the playground until 1.3 and then work again. Sometimes we have {games,}or{art}and other subjects and we go home at 3.30 pm.
At home I play, have{tea}at about 5.30 pm and watch{television}until I go to{bed}at 8.45.
I have a tiring day, but I enjoy it.
